verbs.description: [ARG0: North Korea] [V: says] [ARG1: it will hold a " ceremony " for the dismantling of its nuclear test site on May 23 - 25 in what would be a dramatic but symbolic event to set up leader Kim Jong Un 's summit with President Donald Trump next month] .

North Korea says it [V: will] hold a " ceremony " for the dismantling of its nuclear test site on May 23 - 25 in what would be a dramatic but symbolic event to set up leader Kim Jong Un 's summit with President Donald Trump next month .

North Korea says it will hold a " ceremony " for the dismantling of its nuclear test site on May 23 - 25 in what [V: would] be a dramatic but symbolic event to set up leader Kim Jong Un 's summit with President Donald Trump next month .
